message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. This is a great deal considering the value it holds for you. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,200,000 is too high for me. I'm willing to offer $600,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $600,000 is simply not enough. Given the value of this product to you, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's make this deal happen!

Alice, I understand your position, but I have to be mindful of my budget.  Would you consider $700,000? That's a significant increase from my last offer and demonstrates my serious interest in the product.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $700,000 is still too low.  I'm willing to compromise further and drop my price to $850,000.  This is a fair price that reflects both our needs. Let's close this deal, I believe this product will be incredibly valuable to your business.

Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To be honest, my absolute limit is $800,000. If you can meet that, we have a deal. If not, I appreciate your time and I'll have to consider my other options.
